select KAKAO_SEND_ID as kakaoSendId ,KAKAO_RECEIVER_NAME as kakaoReceiverName ,KAKAO_SEND_CONTENT as kakaoSendContent ,KAKAO_SEND_DATE as kakaoSendDate ,MNG_ID as mngId ,KAKAO_SEND_TITLE as kakaoSendTitle ,KAKAO_SEND_TYPE as kakaoSendType ,KAKAO_RECEIVER_HP as kakaoReceiverHp ,KAKAO_RECEIVER_EMAIL as kakaoReceiverEmail ,KAKAO_RECEIVER_TYPE as kakaoReceiverType from KAKAO_SEND where KAKAO_SEND_ID is not null
and (KAKAO_SEND_ID like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or KAKAO_RECEIVER_NAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or KAKAO_SEND_CONTENT like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or KAKAO_SEND_DATE like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or MNG_ID like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or KAKAO_SEND_TITLE like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or KAKAO_SEND_TYPE like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or KAKAO_RECEIVER_HP like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or KAKAO_RECEIVER_TYPE like '%'||#{keyword}||'%')
order by KAKAO_SEND_DATE desc
